import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import s from './Profile.module.css'; const Profile = ({ name, tag, location, avatar, stats }) => (

{name}

@{tag}

{location}

  • Followers {stats.followers}
  • Views {stats.views}
  • Likes {stats.likes}
); Profile.propTypes = { name: PropTypes.string.isRequired, tag: PropTypes.string, location: PropTypes.string.isRequired, avatar: PropTypes.string, stats: PropTypes.number.isRequired, }; export default Profile;
